mapper.select: SELECT id,username,password,level,qq,weixin,phone,remarks, create_user createUser, create_time createTime, modified_user modifiedUser, modified_time modifiedTime FROM q_admins WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id,username,password,level,qq,weixin,phone,remarks, create_user createUser, create_time createTime, modified_user modifiedUser, modified_time modifiedTime FROM q_admins WHERE username=#{username}
